ComicInfo.Summary:
A volcano halfway around the world has exploded, spewing thousands of tons of ash into the upper atmosphere, blocking the sun's warming light is blocked.
Professor Cook has discovered that not only is winter coming early, but that it could potentially last for more than six months! Even with the support of their hydroponics garden the town's food will run out long before winter does.
Now left with no other choice, Marshville's prehistoric residents must go on a hunt!
